column2: Stellar Fe/H abundance ratio derived from observational data from MOSFIRE spectrometer at Keck I telescope using MCMC photoionization method code GalDNA. The points and errors are representatives for best-fit linear relation with one sigma uncertainties. Fe/H is originally reported in [Fe/H] (=log(Fe/H) - log(Fe/H)_sun)
column3: and is converted using relation under solar abundance pattern (Asplund+09)
